title: Technology Integration in Workplace Training: UDL-Based Blended Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool competency and learning motivation
context.additional_context: Providing flexible learning experiences integrating face-to-face/non-face-to-face environments, fostering engagement through diverse technological tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three strategies for utilizing technology-based training tools in workplace environments.
Learners can design technology-integrated strategies suitable for diverse learner types in accordance with UDL (Universal Design for Learning) principles.
Learners can develop team-based training modules using collaborative tools (e.g., Padlet, Miro) in blended learning environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
